utils.auth

Class MobileAppToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.auth.MobileAppToken

  • public class MobileAppToken
extends java.lang.Object
    Mobile app instance token This token is used to uniquely identify an application instance. This token can be exchanged into a session token when the user logs in on his mobile device

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      org.bson.types.ObjectId appId
      the id of the application
      org.bson.types.ObjectId instanceId
      the id of the application instance
      java.lang.String phrase
      the secret passphrase of the application instance
